title: Bilkis Bano case | Grant of remission ‘classic case’ of using SC order to violate law: verdict
selftext:
“The respondents had not divulged a series of facts which would have tilted the Supreme Court’s decision against them.” 

“The State of Gujarat never sought for the review of the May 13, 2022 order of this court by bringing to the notice of this court that it was contrary to Section 432 (7) and judgments of this court.”
comments: What's irritating is that the court just gives statements, but there's no real consequences for governments violating the law..
What sick state government protects convicted rapists? Imagine a whole government machinery to protect and release and celebrate rapists… shame on you Gujrat… garbage state
